title: Nightfall (restored, with intro and outro) (1956, film noir, imdb score: 7.1)

sources.title: Nightfall (restored, with intro and outro) (1956, film noir, imdb score: 7.1)
sources.description: Nightfall is a 1956 American crime film noir directed by Jacques Tourneur and starring Aldo Ray , Brian Keith and Anne Bancroft . The low-budget film is remembered today for camera work by cinematographer Burnett Guffey . It uses flashbacks as a device to tell the story, which was based on a 1948 novel by David Goodis . The theme song, "Nightfall," was composed by Peter De Rose and "Charles Harold" (Charles H. Cuppett), with lyrics by Sam M. Lewis and sung by Al Hibbler .
